item.description:
This first meeting will be very low-key - an introduction and chat session over cocktails.

We can discuss if we want to do something more formal or if a night out on the town is just what we're all looking for.

Please RSVP if you want to come, so I can give Watch City some idea of how many people will be coming.

Thanks! :)
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the host where the "meetup" people are, and they'll point you in my direction. I promise I'll be on the lookout.
item.why: You want to come because: You want to meet new people; You want to try Watch City brews; You want to have fun in a relaxed atmosphere; You like eating pub food; You brew at home, or you don't; You are new to the area
item.name: The Waltham Beer February Meeting
